Season2324.title: Start of the 2023-2024 Season
Season2324.header: Happy to announce the start of the new football season! This year we have a new website. All details are available at the click of a button
Season2324.topic: Main features of our new website

paragraph.1: 1. Authorization. Each participant now has the opportunity to register on the website, use their personal account, and change their display name at will. In the near future, you will also be able to upload your photo.
paragraph.3: 3. The entire site interface design is based on the voting preferences of all participants for ease of use specifically on smartphones. Therefore, not all pages of the site may display beautifully on large monitor screens at the moment. There may also be various minor display issues on very small smartphone screens. If you encounter crooked tables/pages, let me know in private.
paragraph.4: 4. We now have website news (like this one you are reading now :D). They will be rare, but now you can always come back and read some useful or interesting information about our website, tournament, or any innovations and changes.
paragraph.5: 5. As you may have noticed, many site pages are still unavailable. In the near future, many different tables, interesting statistics, filters, and sorts for different tournaments, participants, etc., will appear, always up-to-date. At the moment, there is the necessary minimum in the form of the main table, bet list, bet results, and personal account.
paragraph.6: 6. Almost any visual and technical changes to the site are possible. Therefore, if you have suggestions and ideas on how to improve the site, do not hesitate to write to me or in the general chat. We will discuss everything and implement the most interesting and useful ideas!
paragraph.2a: 2. Managing seasons and bets is now done directly from the site, not in Excel or GoogleSheets tables as before. All data is stored on the official website
paragraph.2b: Adding and processing bets is now done online. As soon as any bet is added or processed by the moderator, all results, including the main table, are instantly updated in real time.

text.2: To participate in the tournament you need to
text.3: Register on the website. To do this, click on the photo of the guy in glasses and select the option
text.5: Your password must be at least 6 characters long.
text.6: Then go to your personal account (also through this guy) and select the option
text.10: and choose a nickname on the site. Do not write too long names. Only letters/numbers, spaces, and symbols can be used in the name
text.11: You can change your name at any time later.
text.14: In the opened window, click the registration button.
text.17: The site is developed using modern security technologies. All data transmission is carried out through a secure SSL certificate using https connection. Also, for example, when entering a password, a secure keyboard is used, in addition, all passwords are encrypted using a reliable BCrypt system and stored in the database as a hash. It is physically impossible to hack (i.e., decode back) such a password even if access to the database is obtained. Therefore, you can safely use any passwords to register on the site and be sure that they will be reliably protected.
text.18: Later, the ability to register and log in to the site using a Google account will be added
text.19: That's all! Good luck to everyone in our competition!

Season2425.title: Start of the 2024-2025 Season
Season2425.header: The new football season is about to begin! You can read about the new features and changes by clicking the 'More details' button

text.1: 1. Changes in the tournament rules, in section No. 3.
text.2: To avoid turning our competition into a lottery, starting from this season, the increased bet amount will only apply
text.3: to the final games of tournaments
text.4: and will equal twice the bet amount -
text.7: Thus, the standard bet amount of 10 units now applies to all semifinals. This change is due to the fact that in the regular season there are too many semifinal matches (as many as 8!!! - 4 in the CL + 4 in the EL), while the EC and WC are generally quite short tournaments where it's already difficult to create a lead over competitors.
text.9: On this page, you can conveniently track the status of all participants' bets for the current matchday. You can also view the statistics of any previous matchday. The convenience lies in the fact that in one place you can see which bets were submitted by whom, and depending on the bet status (won/lost/missed), only the useful information about it is displayed.
text.9a: Here, you can also check the balance of participants in a specific matchday (it is displayed next to the participant's name). Participants, by the way, are sorted by profit, which makes it very easy to see who was the best on a given week.
text.10: You can find this page by clicking on the 'hamburger' in the top left corner and selecting the corresponding link.
text.12: Each user now has the option to choose a comfortable language.
text.13: The available options are Russian, English, and German. At the moment, almost 100% of the site is translated, including menus, news, rules, team names, leagues, etc.
text.14: The only thing that remains untranslated for now are the names of the bets (there are some complexities there, so I postponed this issue due to lack of time, but they will be translated during this season).
text.16a: Various works were carried out to improve the speed of the site. Now the pages
text.16e: load noticeably faster than before, and viewing them is no longer accompanied by long loading times.
text.17: And the new logo, I hope, adds some style :)
text.18: That's all! Good luck to everyone in the new season!!!
